songs.title: I Love You
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1: A$AP Ferg]
(Yeah)
We could fly to Puerto Rico and fight a mosquito
Or lounge out in Cuba, even though it's illegal (Ah!)
Blowin' Cuban cigars, keep everythin' on the D-low
Or brag to your friends, "You never been here before?" (Yeah)
Baby, I love you, we're celebratin', I love you
Been doin' them squats, your ass tight as a glove (Alright)
Fly like a dove, nobody fuckin' with us
I got the mean pipe but you supply me the drug (Argh)
The pookie in New Jack City, the booty and tig ol' bitties
Blowin' the color purple like Danny Glover and Silly (Ah!)
Versace embedded in me, all of our clothin' silky
God took his time 'cause goddamn, you pretty (Yeah)
And I just really wanna hold ya
I'ma make you say "Uuuh" like a No Limit soldier (Alright)
Then ride her like a roller-coaster
I'ma beat, beat it down like a real man's supposed to (Argh!)

[Chorus: Chris Brown]
Girl, it's you I'm ready to settle down with
And do some things we've never done before (Yeah, girl)
And baby, this a celebration to our lovemaking tonight
'Cause I love you, I love you, babe
Yeah, I love you

[Verse 2: Chris Brown]
Look, house on the water like a casino
Vacation on private islands, notifyin' my P.O
Margiela the peacoat, pockets full of Doritos
Countin' all these Euros, they're like, "What the fuck is a C-Note?"
Yachts with the clear water, it look like my chain
Cameras flashin', paparazzi, yeah, that look like the fame
3M on my jacket, you can't see me the same
Motivated, I'm avoidin' the lames but I'm lookin' for you
Ha, pretty brown nice thing
Rolex faces, bottles in them gold cases
It's ridiculous, with your body a nigga particular
That booty is big enough, she move it, I pick it up
Slow down, baby
Know a nigga singin', we gon' make some Motown babies, ha
A nigga change the weather when I come out
If it's raining, baby, I'ma bring the sun out (Yeah)

[Chorus: Chris Brown & Ty Dolla $ign]
Girl, it's you I'm ready to settle down with
And do some things we've never done before (Yeah, girl)
And baby, this a celebration to our lovemaking tonight
'Cause I love you, I love you, babe
(Dolla $ign)

[Bridge: Ty Dolla $ign]
You know I love ya (Oh)
And I'm gon' love on you every chance that I get (Oh, oh, oh, oh yeah)
And ain't no way that I'm going to walk away
And throw it all away, oh yeah (Woo, alright)
And girl, I won't lie
You know that I get it, you're mines I spend it on you (Yeah)
And every time that we fight
We just fuck and we make right back up (Ooh yeah)

[Chorus: Chris Brown]
Girl, it's you I'm ready to settle down with
And do some things we've never done before (Yeah, girl)
And baby, this a celebration to our lovemaking tonight
'Cause I love you, I love you, babe
Girl, it's you I'm ready to settle down with
And do some things we've never done before (Yeah, girl)
And baby, this a celebration to our lovemaking tonight
'Cause I love you, I love you, babe
